## MultishiftChangeHandlerProps.onSelectedItemsChange() method

Called when the selected items change, either by the user selecting an item or the user clearing the selection. Called with the items that were selected or an empty array when removed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onSelectedItemsChange?(selectedItems: GItem[], state: MultishiftState<GItem>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selectedItems | <code>GItem[]</code> | The currently selected items if an empty array then the selection was cleared. |
|  state | <code>MultishiftState&lt;GItem&gt;</code> | the list of all currently selected items. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
